'''Standard Fluid Shipping Unit''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Standard Fluid Shipping Unit is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Fontaine]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in [[Erinnyes Forest]] after solving a [[Potential Energy Orb]] puzzle.
